scenes.endVisualDescription: Close-up of the same parchment, fresh ink signature visible, seal slightly pressed, candlelight brighter, shadows deepening around the document
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward from wide shot to desk surface, candle flame swaying gently, dust particles drifting through the warm light beam
scenes.audioDescription: soft crackle of candle, distant echo of pages turning, low hum of stone walls

scenes.endVisualDescription: The holographic screen becomes fully visible, parchment fading, bright digital interface showing the manifesto headline, ambient light shifting to cold blue tones

scenes.endVisualDescription: Extreme close-up of the monitor highlighting the papal seal, coins glinting brighter, shadows deepening around the tray, red accent intensifying

scenes.audioDescription: low electronic drone, soft clink of coins, faint printer whir, distant server fans
